description:
LEARN THE SECRETS OF THE BEST CONVERSATIONALISTS

(This is the QUICK and DIRTY version of my other 6 hour course)

SIX REASONS WHY THIS COURSE IS AWESOME:

1.    Tons of REAL LIFE EXAMPLES

2.    50 quick Techniques designed to help you IMMEDIATELY

3.    Tons of ACTIONABLE TECHNIQUES 

4.    Tons of RESEARCHED-BASED INFORMATION

5.    CONTENT created by CERTIFIED TRAINING PROFESSIONAL (with a MASTERS in LEARNING and HUMAN PERFORMANCE!)

6.    Based off a popular SOCIAL SKILLS BOOK

Do you want to REALLY improve? Then you need techniques that REALLY work. I chose the Top 50 techniques from my book, The Conversation Code, and created this course. It's fast-paced and jammed packed with useful and actionable tips and tricks for improving your conversation skills right now.

Social skills are they key to achieving your dreams; great jobs, relationships, confidence, and happiness. Without social skill proficiency, you'll always struggle with the most important things in life. By studying the best conversationalists, you'll upgrade your own skills. 

What would you discover if you recorded and analyzed every conversation you encountered or observed for the last 15 years? You could potentially unlock the secret of what separates the best conversationalists from everyone else. I did just that. I deconstructed the behaviors and conversations of the best conversationalists I could find. The end result is my book, Everyday Conversations, and this training.

This training covers all Seven Habits of Exceptional Conversationalists. What they do differently, what they say, and what you can do – starting right now. Learn hundreds of actionable techniques for helping you survive – and thrive – in every kind of conversation and social situation. Contains hundreds of real-life examples! No fluff, just the good stuff.
title: How to Become a GREAT Conversationalist: The 50 Best Tips
